project_plan.name: Random Password Generator in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a Python script that generates a random password with a configurable length, including uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters.

task.name: Implement function to generate random password based on user-defined length
Incorporate functionality to include uppercase letters in the password
Incorporate functionality to include lowercase letters in the password
Incorporate functionality to include numbers in the password
Incorporate functionality to include special characters in the password
Write tests to validate password generation functionality
Execute tests to ensure the password generation works correctly
